title: The Crowned Queen
description: To ensure her safety, a queen hires a kisaeng who looks similar to take her place in the palace.
quote: If you hide in the mountains, I will cut down all the trees to find you.
altHero: a young queen in lavish, traditional Asian clothing and jewels
alt2: the king and his men are surrounded
alt3: the king sheds a tear as he embraces the queen
alt4: the king from behind as he walks past his men
